designation: Data Scientist, ML Engineer, Data Analyst, Web Developer
name: Aryan Verma

education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in IoT&IS

projects.name: Brain Tumor Detection
projects.description: Achieved 94% accuracy in detecting brain tumors by utilizing a pre-trained VGG 16 model and a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN).

projects.name: Spam Email Classification
projects.description: Implemented spam email detection using Naive Bayes, Random Forest, Gradient Booster, and CNN with accuracies of 89%, 99%, 97%, and 95%, respectively.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Launched a web portal to analyze and present global disease information effectively.

projects.name: Self Driving Car
projects.description: Engineered an autonomous self-driving car project with advanced obstacle detection capabilities, ensuring instant halting upon detecting obstacles.

projects.name: Plant Diseases Detection
projects.description: Employed the MobileNet architecture and Keras framework to successfully identify and categorize plant diseases using images from the PlantVillage dataset.

experiences.description: Enhanced machine learning models for email classification at Celebal Technologies, boosting accuracy from 82% to 92%.

full_output.name: Aryan Verma
full_output.position: Data Scientist, ML Engineer, Data Analyst, Web Developer
achievements_and_awards: Published an article on Transforming Casual Observers into Devout Followers: The Unstoppable Force of Storytelling in Driving Sales in Laconic Magazines by House Of Marketers.
